Articles.Content: Stuck him in a space station with a 532,000 m orbit, so he can't #$%^ up my planes.

Sadly, Jeb (and now Valentina) usually goes out fairly early in a blaze of glory test-flying some mad scheme handed down by a government REMF (i.e. me). Bob usually follows, since he's the one doing all of the risky landings for science (and occasionally !!science!!). Bill is still kicking (current custodian of my space station), because he always stays behind safely calculating fuel ratios.

Demo Jeb is still orbiting Demo Mun. He's got enough delta-v to get back, I just bought the full version before I finished the mission. Must go back and get him one of these days.

0.90 career Jeb was killed when the first 2.5-meter "Walrus" rocket exploded on the pad due to not having enough TWR to lift off, and also not having a launch escape system.

1.0.2 career Jeb is currently in command of the Pequod, in Kerbin orbit after retrieving its first asteroid, awaiting a refit before it goes off after another one.

1.0.4 64K sandbox Jeb is on the Science-Dragon IV space station orbiting Kerbin.

Edited September 22, 2015 by Hotaru
In a capsule, returning from Minmus.

The Kraken ate my Jeb

He was on a ladder when I changed scenes, and he just disappeared. Found him as KIA in the astronaut building under missing, and he does not get respawned for some reason, even though I have that option enabled.

Mine's currently having a thorough debriefing and telling-off by Gene in the Astronaut Complex. Bloody daredevil tried to launch aboard a one-man rescue vessel I was sending up empty to recover a Kerbal in Kerbin orbit - lucky I caught him before I hit spacebar!

Edited September 23, 2015 by AxleMC131
Grammar

Fired since Year 2.

He should concentrate on better management for his company -- the parts it supplies are, unsurpiringly, junk, and his hapless employees are getting stranded all over the system. Just yesterday I had to rescue another of his girls that crashed on Minmus, and they tried to offer me a contract to bring back some idiot that managed to lithobrake on Eeloo, no less.

Get your priorities straight, Jeb. Have a medal, a T-Shirt and goodbye.

Orbiting between the beautiful rings of Sarnus, intermittently piloting resource mining missions down to Hale.

I picked up the Outer Planets Mod, having a blast with it so far.

Edited September 23, 2015 by Kerano
Jeb was on the roof of the VAB until I killed the building and he fell into a science lab and survived. Still recovering from the incident.

In sub-Minmus orbit after overshooting lander with jetpack.

He's singing to pass the time.

In my sandbox game, Jeb is in an eccentric orbit around eve. But don't worry, it's a surveyal station for future landings. With no fuel. Or tools to survey the ground. BUT IT HAS A CUPUOLA! So im calling it a surveyal station.
where is Jeb? At KSC...
He survived unplanned plane crash with VAB just like that. He's truly a BadS.

Cooling his jets after having landed on both Minmus and the Mun. He's letting the younger members of the astronaut corps focus on exploring and colonizing those moons.

And he's agitating for a mission to Duna, so he's likely to be in the first expedition there.
A casualty of the early space program along with Bill. The only two Kerbals lost so far. Lost in a catastrophic ascent and then hitting F5 instead of F9. RIP.
Good question... where is my Jebediah Kerman?

Mission Control: Kerbal X Number 73672: Come in please!!

Jebediah: *crackle Housten, We'Ve had a problem.

Mission Control: Wait, what happened??

MechJeb: He's... Floating around in space around target body 6 Minmus.

MC: How...

MJ: He ran out of EVA fuel.

This is in sandbox though. In my career, crying because there is no money for new rockets to send him to other planets.

Mine is on my first SERIOUS duna mission

you know, the ones the kerbals actually return from

In my lightly-modded KSP install, he's in the Astronaut Complex after getting off the Admin building after landing a VTOL awkwardly.

In my heavily-modded KSP install, he's in the Astronaut Complex after the last Minmus mission. (Or was it Valentina who went there last??)

Lounging about the astronaut complex regaling all the 3 and 4 star Kerbals with tales of his visits to Gilly, Moho and and that dip into the atmosphere of Eve. (the 4 stars have already been to Duna, so no need to go over that bit).
All of my Jebs are dead, except for the one orbiting Kerbin on one of my sandbox saves.
He's been sacked in favor of the new probe cores I've unlocked
In orbit around the moon. He was promoted to working with RSS.
Orbiting Laythe. With many other Kerbals which are currently colonizing it... Post Number 300!
Taking his breath after almost deadly reentry from solar orbit.
